alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Harris; Meriwether; Talbot; Taylor; Troup; Upson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 4:11PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Meriwether, southern Upson, southeastern Troup, Crawford, Talbot, northern Taylor and northeastern Harris Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 411 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near F.d. Roosevelt State Park to Horns, and moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hamilton, Roberta, Talbotton, Manchester, Pine Mountain, Reynolds, Warm Springs, Woodland, Pine Mountain-Callaway Gardens, Sunset Village, Shiloh, F.d. Roosevelt State Park, Flint Hill, Sprewell Bluff State Park, Stovall, Salem, Prattsburg, Horns, Big Lazer Creek Wma and Wesley Church. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.

area.areaDesc: Crawford; Harris; Meriwether; Talbot; Taylor; Troup; Upson
